email.title: Showcode - Digital on the Front-Line
email.text:
![Digital on the Front-Line](https://i.imgur.com/8ydD0cZ.png)
Here at ShowCode we're hosting the first of our sponsor spotlight sessions, starting with NHS Digital ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡
Did you know, that at the height of the COVID-19 pandemic, the NHS 111 Online service managed traffic at volumes ninety-five times our highest ever pre-Covid utilisation? Now more than ever, digital is on the frontline. Are you ready to find out more?
Join us for this 30 minute session and hear from some of NHS Digitalâ€™s current trainees on what life is like at the company
If you would like to ask a question ahead of the webinar email alex@showcode.io
### Register here: https://event.webinarjam.com/register/1/pwg5khx
